service.name: md.import
service.documentation:
Import MEF or XML document from a directory on the server.
Parameters: * dir: The directory path * file_type: single|mef * recurse: on|off to search on subfolder or not * uuidAction: nothing|overwrite|generateUUID * styleSheet: The XSLT to apply before loading the record * validate: on|off to validate or not the record. If invalid, the record is not imported * template: n|y|d. The type of record * group: The group to insert the records in * category: _none_ or the id of a category to attached to the records * failOnError: on|off to fail on first error or continue. * assign: on|off to assign records to current catalog
The response contains the total number of records found and the number of imported record. For each error a report is provided. Exception could be validation exception (XSD or schematron) or other type of exception like database constraint error.
For large import, there is no option to have the current progress of the import.
